analysis: This SKILL.md file is completely safe from a security perspective. It defines an SEO audit methodology for documentation pages and contains no executable code, external network requests, file system operations, or credential access attempts. The skill operates entirely within the context of content analysis and optimization recommendations, posing no security risks to users or systems.
